rules_text: The first time you cast an instant or sorcery spell each turn, you may discard a card. If you do, copy that spell, you may choose new targets for the copy.
rules_text2:
[i](Cast when you attack with a single creature.)[/i]
Exile the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand, then deal damage equal to the other card’s mana value to any target.
